meanings: (개인적 견해) opinion (of/on), view (on/about), (제안) suggestion, idea (for), comment

vlive.korean: [자화자찬 츄플 그렇다면 자코디의 의견은?] 좋은데 아웃트로? [What does Zion. T think?] The outtro was good. 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 21. 각성해서 나타난 성균관대 꾼!! 서울대 츄플의 위기??!!
vlive.english: [What does Zion. T think?] The outtro was good.

vlive.korean: [적막을 깨고] 누구 의견이죠? [Someone breaks the silence] Whose opinion was it? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 19. 3억 쯤은 다들 있ㅈㅕ..?? FLEX 터지는 서울대 바팩과 붙을 학교는??
vlive.english: [Someone breaks the silence] Whose opinion was it?

vlive.korean: [과연 이 둘은 의견 차이를 좁힐 수 있을까?] [Will they be able to narrow their difference?] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 17. 2라운드 진출 전! 갑분 멤버 교체 위기? 새롭게 영입된 멤버는 누구?
vlive.english: [Will they be able to narrow their difference?]

vlive.korean: [의견 제시] 끓는 물에 잠깐 넣어두고 물기를 빼야 되는 거 아니야? [Suggestion] Shall we boil it in water and drain it? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.4
vlive.english: [Suggestion] Shall we boil it in water and drain it?

vlive.korean: [전문 래퍼 평가단] - 열 사람 중 네 명의 의견일 뿐이니까 - 그렇죠 아직 뭐... [Professional rappers] - You still have six judges. - Right. It's too early to... 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 18. 용인대 리퍼블릭 VS 고려대 테라 배틀에 심사위원 실화?!
vlive.english: [Professional rappers] - You still have six judges. - Right. It's too early to...

examples.korean: He was not to be budged on the issue. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 사안에 대한 그의 의견을 바꾸게 할 수는 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was not to be budged on the issue. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The coroner’s verdict was ‘death by misadventure’. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 검시관의 의견은 ‘과실 치사’였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The coroner’s verdict was ‘death by misadventure’. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: strictures against civil servants expressing political opinions 듣기 Add to Wordbook 공무원의 정치적 의견 표현에 대한 제한 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: strictures against civil servants expressing political opinions Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Their opinions were at opposite poles of the debate. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들의 의견은 그 논쟁의 상반되는 양극에 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Their opinions were at opposite poles of the debate. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She had no inhibitions about making her opinions known. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 거리낌없이 자기 의견을 드러내었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had no inhibitions about making her opinions known. Add to Wordbook
